senses.sense_definition: Relating to the arrangement or relative position of parts or elements within a structure.

examples.text: The <w>configurational</w> arrangement of atoms determines the specific properties of the molecule.
Engineers analyzed the <w>configurational</w> change in the system to improve its overall efficiency.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to a language structure where the subject is hierarchically outside the verb phrase while the object is inside it.

examples.text: Linguists often classify English as a <w>configurational</w> language because of its rigid syntactic structure.
The professor explained the difference between a <w>configurational</w> language and one with free word order.
